user_query: I'm planning a family gathering and I thought it would be fun to have a friendly basketball match. Please fetch the latest matches available from Admiralbet and provide me with the odds for each match. It would be great if you could include the teams participating and the match timings as well.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest basketball matches available from Admiralbet.
Extract match timings, participating teams, and odds from the fetched data.
